shortSummary: Explore a world filled with the magic of Disney as you discover rich stories and build the perfect neighborhood alongside Disney and Pixar heroes and villains in this new life-sim adventure game. Welcome to Disney Dreamlight Valley.

gameTitle: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
shortSummary: Forget everything you know about The Legend of Zelda games. Step into a world of discovery, exploration, and adventure in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, a boundary-breaking new game in the acclaimed series. Travel across vast fields, through forests, and to mountain peaks as you discover what has become of the kingdom of Hyrule in this stunning open-air adventure.

Meet Pikmin: small, plantlike creatures with distinct abilities that you can grow, pluck, guide, and overpower enemies with! Use your Pikmin’s miniature might (and a bit of strategy) to explore this mysterious planet in search of your crew—and treasure.
Call of Duty®: Black Ops 6 is signature Black Ops across a cinematic single-player Campaign, a best-in-class Multiplayer experience and with the epic return of Round-Based Zombies.

Get ready for a thrilling mix of genres: a cooperative, first-person, open-world fantasy tavern simulator, action, fishing, hunting, exploration, and completing fun and diverse quests. And, of course, COOKING! Play with friends, feed and quench the thirst of the entire world!
crazy game

Embark on a cozy, open-world adventure with Hello Kitty and Friends. Befriend beloved characters as you explore and restore a mysterious island, solve ancient puzzles, cook delicious dishes, customize yourself and your cabins, and so much more.

A space survival open world terraforming crafting game, designed for 1 to 10 players. Alter the ecosystem of an inhospitable planet to render it habitable for humanity. Survive, gather resources, and build your base. Then, generate oxygen, warmth, and pressure to create a brand new biosphere.

Coral Island is a vibrant and laid-back reimagining of farm sim games. Be who you want and experience enchanting island living at your own pace—live off the land, nurture animals, build relationships with a diverse cast of townsfolk, and make the world around you a more vital and harmonious place.
All around chaos

You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home?
Create your own world and design your own characters in The Sims 4. Build the home of your dreams, create unique Sims, and explore vibrant worlds.
Escape to a deserted island paradise and create your own island life. Build, craft, and customize your island home in this charming life simulation game.
An online co-op horror game with up to 6 players. Locate valuable, fully physics-based objects and handle them with care as you retrieve and extract to satisfy your creator's desires.
Flotsam is a game about collecting junk and building a floating town in a flooded world. Gather resources, build your town, and keep your inhabitants happy.
Slime Rancher 2 is a sequel to the popular farming simulation game where you collect and raise adorable slimes. Explore a new world, gather resources, and build your ranch.
Experience the magic of Hogwarts in this open-world action RPG set in the Wizarding World. Create your own character, attend classes, and explore the iconic castle and surrounding areas.
Kirby Air Ride is played primarily through use of a vehicle, many of which are taken from the previous Kirby games, such as the Warpstar.

Kirby & the Amazing Mirror is a platform game in which players control Kirby as he explores a large, interconnected world. The game features a cooperative multiplayer mode, allowing up to four players to play together.

Kirby & the Forgotten Land is a 3D platform game in which players control Kirby as he explores a mysterious world filled with abandoned structures and creatures. The game features cooperative multiplayer gameplay, allowing a second player to control Bandana Waddle Dee.

gameTitle: The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Adventures
shortSummary: The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Adventures is an action-adventure game in which players control Link as he battles enemies and solves puzzles in a top-down perspective. The game features cooperative multiplayer gameplay, allowing up to four players to play together.

gameTitle: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker
shortSummary: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker is an action-adventure game in which players control Link as he explores a vast ocean and battles enemies. The game features a cel-shaded art style and a unique sailing mechanic.

gameTitle: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
shortSummary: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess is an action-adventure game in which players control Link as he battles enemies and solves puzzles in a dark fantasy world. The game features a unique wolf transformation mechanic.

gameTitle: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
shortSummary: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time is an action-adventure game in which players control Link as he battles enemies and solves puzzles in a 3D world. The game features a unique time travel mechanic and is widely regarded as one of the greatest video games of all time.

gameTitle: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask
shortSummary: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask is an action-adventure game in which players control Link as he battles enemies and solves puzzles in a dark fantasy world. The game features a unique time-based mechanic and is known for its darker tone.
Naruto: Clash of Ninja is a fighting game based on the popular anime and manga series Naruto. Players can choose from a variety of characters and battle against each other in 3D arenas.

Pikmin is a real-time strategy game in which players control Captain Olimar as he commands a group of plant-like creatures called Pikmin to solve puzzles and defeat enemies. The game features a unique time-based mechanic and is known for its charming art style.

Pikmin 2 is a real-time strategy game in which players control Captain Olimar and his partner Louie as they command a group of Pikmin to solve puzzles and defeat enemies. The game features new types of Pikmin and a cooperative multiplayer mode.

Pikmin 3 is a real-time strategy game in which players control three new characters as they command a group of Pikmin to solve puzzles and defeat enemies. The game features new types of Pikmin and a cooperative multiplayer mode.

Pokémon Colosseum is a role-playing game in which players control a character named Wes as he battles other trainers and captures Shadow Pokémon. The game features a unique battle system and is set in a 3D world.
Dash is a top-down perspective racing video game in which the player uses a stylus to control a Pikachu and race through checkpoints.

Pokémon Snap is a rail shooter game in which players control a character named Todd Snap as he takes photographs of Pokémon in their natural habitats. The game features a unique photo rating system and is known for its charming art style.
